actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a portion of the Allegheny River, Pennsylvania, for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-358) Designates a specified portion of the Allegheny River, Pennsylvania, constituting the main stem from Kinzua Dam downstream to East Brady, for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a portion of the Allegheny River, Pennsylvania, for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
